revised_title: Crystallography and Electron Distribution of Octafluorocyclohexa-1,3-dieneiron Tricarbonyl
tldr: The authors conducted an X-ray crystallography study of octafluorocyclohexa-1,3-dieneiron tricarbonyl, a transition metal complex. They determined the crystal structure and refined the molecular parameters, providing insights into the bonding and geometry of the complex. This research contributes to the understanding of metal-ligand bonding in transition metal complexes.
